Gods great care of his good people in bad times discovered in several sermons / preached by Mr. James Nalton (late minister of St. Leonards Foster-Lane) immediately upon his return from Holland, about twelve years since ; published by J.F., teacher of short- writing, who took them in characters from the said Mr. J. Nalton. Nalton, James, 1600-1662.
[6], 160 p., [1] leaf of plates : port.
Printed by A.M. for Nathanael Webb ..., London : M.DC.LXV [1655]
Errata: p. 160. Includes frontispiece port. of author. Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
=======
